programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A woman discovers the body of her nephew and investigators must unravel the events that led to his demise, but with three viable suspects, it takes about a year to crack the case using the smallest piece of DNA evidence from the crime scene.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After authorities finally identify the prolific Green River Killer, it becomes a cat-and-mouse game as they must get inside his mind to get him to lead them to the remains of other missing women.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A year after a popular high school senior goes missing, a witness comes forward claiming to know who is responsible for her disappearance and detectives must unravel a web of lies in order to learn the truth.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a hard working Virginia couple is brutally murdered on the eve of their anniversary, the ensuing investigation goes cold until detectives find the most unlikely of suspects.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead in her home, police aren't sure if it's an accident or a murder until they get an unexpected call, from an unexpected person.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After the naked body of an Ohio State senior is found, investigators bring in a suspect for questioning; they play a dangerous game of give and take hoping to get the truth and bring justice to the victim and her family.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Investigators speak for the first time on one of the most baffling cases they've encountered, exposing the truth about what happened to Shanann Watts and her two daughters at the hands of a seemingly devoted husband and father, Chris Watts.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After getting a call that a wife and mother had been missing for 10 years, sheriffs launch an investigation that uncovers a web of lies that leads them to the truth.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A crazed driver goes on a seven-hour shooting spree, killing six people and critically injuring two.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Kenia disappears, her family immediately begins conducting their own investigation to find her; as the police join them in their efforts, they follow alarming leads that cause them to believe Kenia won't be found alive.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman and his closest friend are found shot execution-style; police have little to go on until a surprising development leads investigators to a killer no one ever suspected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a brilliant scientist and devoted family man is found beaten to death, the evidence leads to arrests, but an astounding revelation turns the investigation on its head.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When police find the body of a popular taxi driver stuffed inside the trunk of his own car,which is submerged in a river, they struggle to find suspects -- until the truth begins to emerge.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A loving, single mother of two is the victim of a bizarre murder, leading detectives to investigate a number of suspects.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a recently divorced mother is found strangled to death on her couch, several suspects emerge until the killer is revealed to be someone close to home.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A recently retired woman is found murdered, and detectives struggle with a lack of evidence and try to track down a long list of suspects.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A hard-working young woman is discovered stabbed at the side of a road, leading police on a tireless investigation for 10 years to unveil a killer who is hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a 35-year-old analyst for the NSA is fatally stabbed, police look at a number of suspects; detectives close in on the killer, but the investigation takes a shocking turn.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a 98-year-old widow is found dead in her entryway closet, a chilling discovery leads investigators to a killer in the community who harbors a dark secret.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A beloved resident of a tight-knit Nebraska town is murdered, leading detectives to look at a wide range of suspects before the trail leads to a killer who lives among them.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a respected educator and mother of two is found dead in small-town Alabama, the investigation focuses on fraught family relationships, but the discovery of a dark secret unveils a killer no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A civic-minded teen is shot to death in his own bed, but just as investigators are closing in on those responsible, a twist leaves everyone stunned.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A divorced mother of three is stabbed to death while recovering from major surgery, but police are frustrated by a lack of evidence, until a startling admission reignites the case.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young woman who was just starting out in life is found assaulted and stabbed to death in her boyfriend's home, detectives work tirelessly to uncover a killer who had previously been above suspicion, leaving the town and police force stunned.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Police searching for the killer of a beloved grandfather find the murderer close to home wielding a shocking weapon.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A young woman is killed in her bedroom, and the evidence appears to point to a clear suspect, but it takes 30 years and new evidence to reveal a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A glamorous 85-year-old millionaire is found stabbed in her basement, sending police on an international investigation that unearths devilish secrets, double lives and a killer no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a beloved elderly woman is viciously murdered, detectives discover a chilling connection to another unsolved murder; the trail points to someone from her past and investigators race to hunt the killer down before they can strike again.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After the burned body of a young nursing student is discovered near a rural road, detectives investigate several suspects until the trail of evidence unearths a disturbing and predatory plot.
